1370: Wellinus moved to Corte gracht.B.8 after marriage.
Got married to Geile at age 36 in 1370.
Had a son with Geile, Woutersoet, at age 36.
1371: Had a son with Geile, Folpertus, at age 37.
1372: Had a daughter with Geile, Trame, at age 38.
1374: Had a son with Geile, Gherelm, at age 40.
1376: Had a son with Geile, Martin, at age 42.
1377: Had a son with Geile, Brandekijn, at age 43.
Lost son Martin when Martin was 2 years old.
1378: Had a daughter with Geile, Cecilia, at age 44.
1379: Had a daughter with Geile, Lelien, at age 45.
